title: Off To LIV
description:
Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth and Israel Gutierrez debate how they expect the Majors to handle players leaving the PGA Tour for LIV Golf and how they see things playing out for the Lakers now that they seem to be all in on Russell Westbrook.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: (debatable): How Will The Majors In Golf Handle Players Leaving For The LIV Tour?
